html:
2025-0696
2025-09-30GACUnited Nations ActRegulations Amending the Regulations Implementing the United Nations Resolutions on IranRegulations Amending the Regulations Implementing the United Nations Resolutions on Iran in order to (1) reimpose the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) sanctions on Iran that were lifted as part of the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action; (2) reimpose requirements for Canada to send a notification to the UNSC within 10 days of the supply, sale or transfer from Canada to Iran of certain sensitive nuclear goods and technologies not prohibited under UNSC sanctions; and (3) reimpose asset freezes and travel bans on Iranian nationals and entities designated by the UNSC.N/A
subject: Regulations Amending the Regulations Implementing the United Nations Resolutions on Iran
precis: Regulations Amending the Regulations Implementing the United Nations Resolutions on Iran in order to (1) reimpose the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) sanctions on Iran that were lifted as part of the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action; (2) reimpose requirements for Canada to send a notification to the UNSC within 10 days of the supply, sale or transfer from Canada to Iran of certain sensitive nuclear goods and technologies not prohibited under UNSC sanctions; and (3) reimpose asset freezes and travel bans on Iranian nationals and entities designated by the UNSC.
